DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , double-dummy , multicenter , randomize , active-controlled , parallel group , outpatient , safety study evaluate long term safety arformoterol treatment subject COPD . Study participation approximately 6 month . This study previously post Sepracor Inc . In October 2009 , Sepracor Inc. acquire Dainippon Sumitomo Pharma. , October 2010 , Sepracor Inc 's name change Sunovion Pharmaceuticals Inc .
